content.text: pretty good, just moved to NY for school!
oh nice! what are you studying?
designing, i love horror movies so im excited to be in the city
thats so cool! i love horror movies too. i like to go outside at night and eavesdrop on my neighbors arguments, its a really good adrenaline rush
no way! thats so cool. i like to do that too, but i love the rush i get from pushing myself to the limit, so i like to go outside and run really fast.
thats awesome! i dont think i could run very fast, but i love racing cars for a living. its so much fun, i get to push myself to the limit every time
thats so cool! i love adrenaline rushes, so that sounds like a lot of fun
yeah, it is. i love it. what kind of designing are you studying?
i am studying fashion designing. i love designing clothes, and i love the creative process
thats so cool! i wish i could draw. i can draw stick figures, but thats about it.
thats okay! its all about practice. i love to draw, and i love coming up with new designs
thats awesome! i bet youre really good at it.
thanks! i think i am, but i still have a lot to learn
well, youre definitely on the right track!
